wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Phillips (born 14 July 1982) is a British ice hockey forward for Sheffield Steelers in the EIHL. Phillips has also captained the Great Britain men's national ice hockey team and passed 100 senior caps at the 2021 IIHF World Championship.
